articles.title: NASA Highlights Science on Next Northrop Grumman Space Station Mission - NASA
articles.description: NASA will host a media call at 1 p.m. EST on Thursday, Feb. 10, to discuss the science and technology demonstrations bound for the International Space Station aboard Northrop Grumman’s Cygnus spacecraft on the company’s 17th commercial resupply mission.
